Method Summary
 void boundVariableElsewhereIsNotFree()
          Variable in compound abstractions can be bound in any of them.
 void boundVariableIsNotFree()
          Variable bound in this abstraction is not free.
 void equalsIfAlphaConvertible()
          Two lambda abstractions are equal if one is alpha convertible to another, which means that they are exact the same w.r.t. variable name substitution.
 void itselfAndBodySubterms()
          Abstractions subterms are the abstraction itself and all subterms of its body.
 void normalFormHasBodyInNormalForm()
          Normal form of an abstraction should have its body in normal form.
 void setUp()
          Set up method for fixture.
 void substituteAbstractionVariable()
          Substitution for variable bound by lambda abstraction has no effect.
 void substituteBoundVariable()
          Substition of a variable bound in body of this lambda abstraction should substitute the body.
 void substituteFreeVariable()
          Substition of a free variable in body of this lambda abstraction.
